dct_title_s: AMERICA AVGVSTINIANA In Sex distincta Prouincjas Pr. MEXICANA alias NOVAE HISPANIAE sieu NOMINIS IESV possidet Conuet’ 68. vicariatus 5. PR. PERVANA possidet Conuent’ 35. Vicariatus 2. PR. MECHOACANENSIS possidet Conuent’. 32. Vicariatus 4. PR. QVITENSIS possid. Conuent’. 18. doctrinas 18. PR. NOVI REGNI GRANATENSIS Conuent’ 13. Vicariatus 16. Doctrinas 4. PR. CHILENSIS Conuentus 7
dct_description_sm: Tip of California shown at upper left without any labeling.
Leafy decorative cartouche surrounds the text.
Issued in his: Orbis Avgvstianvs siue conventvvm ordinis ... / P. Bavdovyn. -- Paris, 1659. (A book about monasteries.)
F. Aug. Lubin Ord. Chorographus delin. et Sculp. cum privil. Regis.
